name: Space Star Sam: Invasion Of the Planet Snatchers
name_original: Space Star Sam: Invasion Of the Planet Snatchers
description:
What is this Game About?

Use single mouse controls to jump around between different gravity emitting mini planets (get it its the theme of the Jam) facing platforming challenges and puzzles, inspired by the likes of Mario Galaxy and Portal.

Featuring:

  A design process inspired by Super Mario 3d World and the games of 3KliksPhillip.

  An attempt at a polished graphical style.

  Generally bug free code.

  A fully original soundtrack

General Credits:

Gravity System based on version by Night Frost (Link)

Sound Effects made with BFXR (link)

Music made with BeepBox (link)

Made with GameMaker Studio 2 (link)
